sqlMap.select: SELECT a.code_kind ,a.code_certifi ,a.code_seq ,a.code_bran ,a.bran_seq ,a.receipt_no ,a.point_manage ,a.attend_cnt ,a.time_cnt ,a.result_point ,a.result_no ,a.result_state ,a.up_date ,a.updater FROM oper_result a, operater b where 1=1 and a.code_kind = b.code_kind and a.code_certifi = b.code_certifi and a.code_seq = b.code_seq and a.code_bran = b.code_bran and a.bran_seq = b.bran_seq and a.receipt_no = b.receipt_no
